nodes.text: The ongun-nur were large bird creatures native to the planet of Ansion. Despite their great, intimidating size, the ongun-nur were generally timid creatures. They usually traveled in large flocks. They had yellow eyes, pointed beaks, and their bodies were large, but mostly filled with air.
The ongun-nur had very thin wings, and were unable to fly against the wind. They instead went wherever the wind took them.
